Hello, thanks for a great language!

I tried renaming a definition but it didn't work: VS Code displayed "no refactorings available".

I've searched the LSP source code for a "textDocument/rename" handler but couldn't find it. Also searched for the calls to registerLspRequestHandler, but none of them mentioned "textDocument/rename" either.

Could you please confirm that this feature is not implemented yet? If yes - are there any workarounds available?
Can you post a #mwe with lean code which gives the error?
